Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2009 08:43PM edcicu wrote: I had low grade DCIS, stage 0, 3.5 m and I had lumpectomy and second surgery fiften days before, and obtained a good clear margins. Today, March 20, 2009, the surgeon told me, I dont need radiation or tamoxifen.
Posts.Title: anyone with low grade dcis not having radiation joe1234 ballet12
